segments.text: The sight of that overflowing sink is truly unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just cascading over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a small waterfall right there in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is wide open, completely unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the growing puddle spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to cause a lot of damage to the cabinets and flooring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of water seeping into everything makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so messy and unsanitary to have standing water like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman is standing in it, completely oblivious, which is maddening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to address this issue immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a very hazardous, slippery surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one slips and falls in this deluge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is quite a watery disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The drain must be completely blocked for this to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an absolute waste of water and a potential repair nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR
